messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] selling on ebay, half and Amazon
messages.msgSnippet: I agree with Kristen s comments and experience re selling on ebay/half and Amazon.  I like half.com b/c it is the quick and easy...pictures and product
messages.messageBody:
I agree with Kristen's comments and experience re selling on ebay/half and
Amazon. I like half.com b/c it is the quick and easy...pictures and product
descriptions are not usually needed.

I like to list toys, games and educational tools on half.com's "everything
else" section. Most are the items I am selling already the product set up,
but if it doesn't, then you can set up one.

I currently have 60 items for sell on half.com and 10 items on ebay. Most
are homeschooling items. Email me privately if you are interested in a list
of items I am selling. Susan
